findAlingments[source]

findAlingments(record_dict, barcode_primer, inward_end, max_alignments)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
barcode_primer = Seq("CGCTCAGTTC")
record_dict = SeqIO.index("test_data/test.fastq", "fastq")
ends1 = findAlingments(record_dict, barcode_primer, 200, 50)
ends2 = findAlingments(record_dict, barcode_primer.complement(), 200, 50)
ends3 = findAlingments(record_dict, barcode_primer.reverse_complement(), 200, 50)
ends4 = findAlingments(record_dict, Seq("TCAACGCAGAGT"), 200, 50)
ends5 = findAlingments(record_dict, Seq("TCAACGCAGAGT").complement(), 200, 50)
ends6 = findAlingments(record_dict, Seq("TCAACGCAGAGT").reverse_complement(), 200, 50)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for i in [ends1, ends2, ends3, ends4, ends5, ends6]:
    print("sum:", np.sum(i[:,-1] > 85))
    print("median:",np.median(i[:,-1]))

median: 60.0
